name: pnp-list-formatting-image-card-tiles
title: Image Card Tiles
shortDescription: This sample shows images in a tile layout using SharePoint's Gallery view. Each image tile is clickable and opens a link from another column.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates how to create a visually appealing tile layout for images in SharePoint lists using the Gallery view. Each tile contains an image that is clickable, linking to a URL specified in another column. The design includes a clean, modern look with rounded corners and a shadow effect, making it suitable for showcasing images in a gallery or catalog format. This is a view formatter (tile formatter) that applies to the entire Gallery view.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how list views in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. View formatting allows you to customize the entire rendering of a view by constructing a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed and the styles to be applied to those elements.
